item.title: Famitsu Sales: 1/20/25 – 1/26/25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/famitsu-sales-1-20-25-1-26-25

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist opens at 14,876 retail copies sold.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of January 20, 2025 to January 26, 2025.

Donkey Kong Country Returns HD for Switch remained the highest selling title of the week following its debut the previous week, moving an additional 35,256 retail copies.

ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist was the highest selling new release, moving 9,586 copies on Switch and 5,290 copies on PlayStation 5, for an opening week total of 14,876 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 45,327 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 12,341 units, the Xbox Series family sold 1,087 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 31 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [NSW] Donkey Kong Country Returns HD (Nintendo, 01/16/25) – 35,256 (142,349)
  2. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 18,444 (1,139,854)
  3. [PS5] Dynasty Warriors: Origins (Koei Tecmo, 01/17/25) – 17,391 (81,196)
  4. [NSW] ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist (Binary Haze Interactive, 01/23/25) – 9,586 (New)
  5. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 6,606 (8,058,448)
  6. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 5,859 (6,221,842)
  7. [NSW] Tales of Graces f Remastered (Bandai Namco, 01/16/25) – 5,532 (31,233)
  8. [PS5] ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist (Binary Haze Interactive, 01/23/25) – 5,290 (New)
  9. [NSW] Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake (Square Enix, 11/14/24) – 4,605 (984,585)
  10. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 4,553 (3,796,855)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on January 31.

  1. [PS4] ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist (Binary Haze Interactive, 01/22/25) – (New)
  2. [NSW] Guilty Gear: Strive (Arc System Works, 01/23/25) – (New)
  3. [PS4] School Girlfriend 2 (Entergram, 01/23/25) – (New)
  4. [NSW] School Girlfriend 2 (Entergram, 01/23/25) – (New)
  5. [PS5] Tales of Graces f Remastered (Bandai Namco, 01/17/25) –
  6. [PS5] SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada Deluxe Edition (Bandai Namco, 01/16/25) –
  7. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  8. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  9. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) –
  10. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –
  11. [NSW] It Takes Two (Electronic Arts, 12/08/22) –
  12. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom (Nintendo, 09/26/24) –
  13. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu wa Kibou de Mawatteru! (Konami, 11/16/23) –
  14. [NSW] Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo, 10/20/23) –
  15. [NSW] Kenka Bancho Otome Double Pack (Spike Chunsoft, 01/16/25) –
  16. [NSW] Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 Special Price (SEGA, 11/18/22) –
  17. [NSW] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  18. [NSW] The Game of Life for Nintendo Switch (Takara Tomy, 10/06/23) –
  19. [NSW] Ring Fit Adventure (Nintendo, 10/18/19) –
  20. [NSW] Mario & Luigi: Brothership (Nintendo, 11/07/24) –
  21. [NSW] Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival (Bandai Namco, 09/22/22) –
  22. [NSW] Splatoon 3 (Nintendo, 09/09/22) –
  23. [NSW] Freedom Wars Remastered (Bandai Namco, 01/09/25) –
  24. [NSW] Pikmin 4 (Nintendo, 07/21/23) –
  25. [NSW] Suika Game Special Edition (Aladdin X, 11/14/24) –
  26. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu: Showa, Heisei, Reiwa mo Teiban! (Konami, 11/19/20) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. Switch OLED Model – 31,816 (8,682,778)
  2. Switch Lite – 8,772 (6,426,960)
  3. PlayStation 5 – 6,372 (5,446,090)
  4. Switch – 4,739 (20,046,468)
  5. PlayStation 5 Pro – 4,608 (144,510)
  6. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 1,361 (909,993)
  7. Xbox Series S – 589 (329,189)
  8. Xbox Series X – 353 (314,888)
  9. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 145 (17,485)
  10. PlayStation 4 – 31 (7,929,190)

item.title: Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2 coming to PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 13
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/snezhinka-sentinel-girls-2-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-and-switch-on-february-13

  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

Publisher PLAYISM and developer hinyari9 will release side-scrolling shooter Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 13 for $11.99, the companies announced.

Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2 first launched for PC via Steam on August 27, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via PLAYISM:

This is the sequel to Marfusha: Sentinel Girls, the second entry in the series of high-tempo shooting game with simple controls.

Play as Snezhinka, an employee of a private military company in a dystopian world depicted in beautiful 2.5D pixel art. Go to various different battlefields and defend your objectives from the enemy’s onslaught.

Every day you manage to survive will net you a salary, but this goes through all sorts of tax deductions and other payments… and you’ll have to use your meager earnings left over to strengthen yourself, buy new equipment, and recruit coworkers.

In Story Mode, the story changes based on which coworker you choose to fight with. Read every story to their ends over multiple playthroughs.

There are also two different Challenge Modes that both fully support online rankings, as well as a Collection where you can view all sorts of elements you obtain in-game.

The console version comes with the artbook included.

Watch a new trailer below.

Consoles Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: EDEN.schemata(); launches this spring
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/eden-schemata-launches-this-spring

  • PC

Demo playable during Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Edition.

Science-fiction mystery adventure game EDEN.schemata(); will launch for PC via Steam this spring, ublisher PLAYISM will developers illuCalab. and WSS playground announced. A demo will be available during Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Edition, which will run from February 24 to March 3.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via PLAYISM:

You awaken in a dark, locked room, only to find a broken android and a headless body…

Investigate every corner of a lab isolated from the world to solve this strange murder mystery.

What you notice will reshape this world, from the premise of the story, to the game itself. Experience a narrative that can only be realized in video game format.

Watch today’s PLAYISM Game Show mini featuring the announcement below.

PLAYISM Game Show mini: January 30, 2025

English

Japanese

Chinese
